welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bee Cave! Get ready to experience the charming small town atmosphere, picturesque landscapes, and rich history this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bee Cave has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Austin-bergstrom International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Austin-bergstrom International Airport is a smaller terminal used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Austin Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and retail stores.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Austin Executive Airport provides exclusive services for private jet travelers, including luxurious lounges and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at San Marcos Regional Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
